cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This policy explains how Foodbrain uses cookies and similar technologies in compliance with GDPR and ePrivacy Directive requirements.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the owners of the site. Cookies help us recognize your device, remember your preferences, and improve your experience on our platform.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as page navigation, language selection, and access to secure areas of the site. The website cannot function properly without these cookies. They are usually set in response to your actions like setting privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms.
essential.examples: Examples include: NEXT_LOCALE (language preference), session security tokens, and load balancing identifiers.
essential.alwaysActive: These cookies are always active and cannot be disabled as they are strictly necessary for the website to function.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: These cookies allow us to remember choices you make (such as your username, language preference, or region) and provide enhanced, more personal features. They may also be used to remember changes you've made to text size, fonts, and other customizable elements of the website.
functional.purpose: Purpose: To remember your preferences and provide enhanced functionality.
functional.requiresConsent: These cookies require your explicit consent before being set.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. They help us identify which pages are most and least popular and understand how visitors move around the site. This information helps us improve our website and services.
analytics.purpose: Purpose: To analyze website performance and improve user experience.
analytics.requiresConsent: These cookies require your explicit consent before being set.
analytics.providers: We use analytics services such as Google Analytics to collect this information.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements. They may be set by our advertising partners to build a profile of your interests and show you personalized content on other sites you visit.
marketing.purpose: Purpose: To deliver relevant advertisements and measure advertising effectiveness.
marketing.requiresConsent: These cookies require your explicit consent before being set.
marketing.providers: We may use services such as Facebook Pixel for marketing purposes.

languageCookies.title: Cookies and Language Selection
languageCookies.content: Foodbrain uses cookies to enhance your language selection experience. When you choose a language preference using our language selector, we may set a cookie to remember your selection. This ensures that:
languageCookies.benefit1: Your preferred language is remembered for future visits
languageCookies.benefit2: You don't need to select your language each time you return to the site
languageCookies.benefit3: Your session remains consistent as you navigate through different pages
languageCookies.benefit4: The application can properly route you to the correct language version of content

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Cookie Usage
legalBasis.content: Under the GDPR and ePrivacy Directive, we require your explicit consent before setting non-essential cookies on your device. Essential cookies are necessary for the website to function and do not require consent.
legalBasis.explicitConsent: We obtain your explicit consent for functional, analytics, and marketing cookies through our cookie consent banner.
legalBasis.yourRights: You have the right to accept or reject non-essential cookies, and to withdraw your consent at any time.
legalBasis.howWeCollect: We collect consent through our cookie banner when you first visit our website, and through our cookie preferences modal when you customize your settings.

consentManagement.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
consentManagement.content: You have full control over your cookie preferences. You can accept or reject non-essential cookies at any time.

howToManage.title: How to Manage Your Preferences
howToManage.banner: When you first visit our website, a cookie consent banner will appear allowing you to Accept All, Reject All, or Customize your preferences.
howToManage.footer: You can change your preferences at any time by clicking 'Cookie Settings' in our footer.
howToManage.withdraw: To withdraw all consent, use the 'Withdraw Consent' option in Cookie Settings or contact us.

withdrawRights.title: Your Rights
withdrawRights.right2: Change your preferences at any time
withdrawRights.right3: Withdraw all consent with immediate effect
withdrawRights.right4: Request a copy of your consent records

withdrawalProcess.title: How to Withdraw Consent
withdrawalProcess.content: To withdraw your consent, click the 'Cookie Settings' link in our footer, then click 'Withdraw All Consent'. This will immediately stop all non-essential cookies from being set and remove existing marketing and analytics cookies from your device.
withdrawalProcess.immediateEffect: Your withdrawal takes effect immediately. Analytics and marketing cookies will be cleared from your device within 24 hours.

cookieDuration.title: Cookie Duration
cookieDuration.content: Cookies may remain on your device for different periods of time:
cookieDuration.sessionContent: These temporary cookies are deleted when you close your browser.
cookieDuration.persistentContent: These remain on your device for a set period (usually up to 12 months) or until you manually delete them.
cookieDuration.consentRetention: Consent records are retained for 12 months from the date of consent, after which you will be asked to provide consent again.
cookieDuration.analyticsRetention: Analytics data is retained for 14 months in accordance with industry standards.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies and Services
thirdParty.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We allow third-party companies to set cookies when you visit our website to help us analyze how the site is used, to provide social media features, or to deliver relevant advertising.

analytics.title: Analytics Services
analytics.description: We use analytics services to understand how visitors interact with our website. These services may set cookies to collect information about your use of our website.

payment.title: Payment Processing
payment.description: Our payment processor may set cookies necessary for transaction processing.

marketing.title: Marketing Services
marketing.description: Marketing services help us deliver relevant advertisements and measure advertising effectiveness.

thirdParty.optOut: You can opt out of third-party tracking through your browser settings or our cookie preferences modal.
thirdParty.privacyLinks: These third parties have their own privacy policies governing how they use your information. Please refer to their privacy policies for more information.

manageCookies.title: How to Manage Cookies
manageCookies.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can typically:
manageCookies.option1: View cookies stored on your device
manageCookies.option3: Block cookies from all or specific websites
manageCookies.option4: Set preferences for first-party and third-party cookies
manageCookies.warning: Please note that blocking or deleting cookies may affect your experience on our website and may prevent some features from working properly.
manageCookies.note: In addition to browser settings, you can manage your preferences through our Cookie Settings link in the footer at any time.

dnt.title: Do Not Track
dnt.content: Some browsers have a "Do Not Track" (DNT) feature that signals to websites that you do not want to be tracked. Currently, there is no industry standard for handling DNT signals, so our website does not respond to DNT signals at this time. However, you can manage your cookie preferences through our consent banner or browser settings.

updates.title: Changes to This Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our business practices. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on this page with an updated revision date. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through a prominent notice on our website or by email.
